ing: 1 tablespoon whipped cream, or to taste
des: "This makes for a festive-looking, delicious holiday after-dinner drink at Thanksgiving and Christmas. Nice addition at Halloween parties too!"
ins: Fill a glass 1/2-full with ice. Pour pumpkin spice-flavored liqueur and vanilla-flavored vodka over ice; top with half-and-half. Stir drink with cinnamon stick and garnish with whipped cream and pumpkin pie spice.
